issues.description: Document references Kubernetes 1.31 but AWS now supports Kubernetes 1.33 (released May 2025) and 1.34 (released October 2025)
issues.recommendation: Update Kubernetes version references to 1.33 or 1.34. EKS 1.33 includes stable sidecar containers, topology-aware routing, and DRA for network interfaces. EKS 1.34 adds projected service account tokens and improved DRA prioritized alternatives.

issues.description: Missing EKS 1.33+ DRA (Dynamic Resource Allocation) for network interfaces which is now stable
issues.recommendation: Add section on DRA network interface support in K8s 1.33+, which enables dynamic allocation of network resources for GPU workloads

issues.description: vLLM version not specified - should reference latest stable version
issues.recommendation: Specify vLLM version (e.g., v0.6.x or later) and note compatibility with CUDA 12.x

issues.description: Karpenter version not specified, should reference v1.0+ stable release
issues.recommendation: Update to Karpenter v1.0+ which is now GA and includes improved GPU node provisioning

issues.description: Missing guidance on EKS 1.33+ in-place resource resizing for vertical scaling
issues.recommendation: Add section on in-place pod resource resizing (stable in K8s 1.33) for GPU workloads to avoid pod restarts

issues.description: GPU Operator version not specified
issues.recommendation: Reference NVIDIA GPU Operator v24.x or later for CUDA 12.x support

issues.description: DCGM Exporter version not specified
issues.recommendation: Specify DCGM Exporter version (e.g., 3.3.x or later) for H100/H200 support

issues.description: Document references EKS 1.31 but should reference 1.33 or 1.34 for latest features
issues.recommendation: Update all EKS version references to 1.33 (stable sidecar containers, topology-aware routing) or 1.34 (projected service account tokens, improved DRA)

issues.description: Missing EKS 1.33+ stable sidecar containers feature which is critical for agent architectures
issues.recommendation: Add section on stable sidecar containers (K8s 1.33+) for agent sidecar patterns, logging, and observability

issues.description: Missing EKS 1.34+ projected service account tokens for improved security
issues.recommendation: Add section on projected service account tokens (stable in K8s 1.34) for enhanced security in agent-to-service authentication

issues.description: Missing EKS 1.33+ topology-aware routing for improved performance
issues.recommendation: Add guidance on topology-aware routing (stable in K8s 1.33) to reduce cross-AZ traffic costs and improve latency

issues.description: Gateway API version not specified
issues.recommendation: Specify Gateway API version (v1.2.0 or later) for HTTPRoute and GRPCRoute support

documents.document: llm-d 기반 EKS Auto Mode 추론 배포 가이드

issues.description: Document specifies kubectl >= 1.31 but should recommend 1.33 or 1.34 for latest features
issues.recommendation: Update kubectl version requirement to >= 1.33 to match EKS 1.33/1.34 support

issues.location: EKS Auto Mode 클러스터 생성 section
issues.description: Cluster config specifies version 1.31 which is outdated
issues.recommendation: Update cluster version to 1.33 or 1.34. Use 1.33 for stable sidecar containers and topology-aware routing, or 1.34 for projected service account tokens and improved DRA.

issues.description: Uses Karpenter v1 API but should specify stable version
issues.recommendation: Confirm Karpenter API version (karpenter.sh/v1 is correct for v1.0+) and add note about Karpenter v1.0+ GA status

issues.description: Missing p5e.48xlarge (H200) instance type which is newer and more powerful
issues.recommendation: Add p5e.48xlarge instance type with 8× H200 141GB HBM3 GPUs to the comparison table

issues.description: Gateway API version 1.4.0 specified but should use latest stable version
issues.recommendation: Update Gateway API to v1.2.0 or later (check latest stable release) for improved HTTPRoute and GRPCRoute support

issues.description: Document states llm-d v0.4 (2025) but should verify latest version
issues.recommendation: Verify llm-d latest version from GitHub releases and update if newer version available

issues.description: vLLM version not specified in deployment examples
issues.recommendation: Specify vLLM version (e.g., v0.6.x or later) in container image tags

issues.description: DRA API version information is outdated. Document mentions K8s 1.31 Beta but doesn't cover 1.32+ v1beta1 API changes or 1.33+ stability improvements
issues.recommendation: Update DRA section to reflect: K8s 1.32 introduces v1beta1 API with new implementation (KEP #4381), K8s 1.33 stabilizes v1beta1 with performance improvements, K8s 1.34 adds DRA prioritized alternatives. Add warning that v1alpha2 examples are for K8s 1.31 and below.

issues.description: Missing p5e.48xlarge (H200) and g6e instance family
issues.recommendation: Add p5e.48xlarge (8× H200 141GB) and g6e.xlarge~48xlarge (NVIDIA L40S) instance types to comparison table with specifications and use cases

issues.description: DCGM Exporter image version 4.2.2-4.1.3 may be outdated
issues.recommendation: Verify and update DCGM Exporter to latest version (3.3.x or 4.x series) for H100/H200 support

issues.description: Karpenter API version not explicitly stated
issues.recommendation: Add note that examples use Karpenter v1 API (karpenter.sh/v1) which is GA in Karpenter v1.0+

issues.description: Specifies Kubernetes 1.28+ but should recommend 1.33+ for topology-aware routing
issues.recommendation: Update Kubernetes version requirement to 1.33+ to leverage topology-aware routing and traffic distribution (stable in K8s 1.33) for improved gateway performance

issues.description: Gateway API version 1.3.0 specified but should use latest stable version
issues.recommendation: Update Gateway API to v1.2.0 or later (verify latest stable release) for improved HTTPRoute, GRPCRoute, and experimental features

issues.description: Kgateway version 2.0.5 may be outdated, should verify latest version
issues.recommendation: Verify Kgateway latest version from Helm repository and update installation command if newer version available

issues.description: Missing guidance on topology-aware routing configuration
issues.recommendation: Add section on configuring topology-aware routing (K8s 1.33+) to reduce cross-AZ traffic costs and improve latency for inference workloads

immediate_actions: Update all Kubernetes version references from 1.31 to 1.33 or 1.34 across all documents
Add DRA v1beta1 API documentation for K8s 1.32+ with migration guide from v1alpha2
Update GPU instance type tables to include p5e.48xlarge (H200) and g6e family (L40S)
Verify and update all component versions (vLLM, Karpenter, Gateway API, DCGM Exporter, etc.)
important_updates: Add sections on EKS 1.33+ stable features: sidecar containers, topology-aware routing, in-place resource resizing
Add sections on EKS 1.34+ features: projected service account tokens, improved DRA prioritized alternatives
Update Karpenter examples to reference v1.0+ GA status and stable API
Add best practices for topology-aware routing in inference gateway configurations
minor_improvements: Specify exact versions for all container images and Helm charts
Add version compatibility matrices for component combinations
Update external documentation links to latest versions
Add migration guides for version upgrades

validation_notes: AWS EKS now supports Kubernetes 1.32 (January 2025), 1.33 (May 2025), and 1.34 (October 2025)
K8s 1.33 brings stable sidecar containers, topology-aware routing, and DRA for network interfaces
K8s 1.34 adds projected service account tokens and improved DRA prioritized alternatives
DRA API has evolved: v1alpha2 (K8s 1.26-1.31), v1beta1 (K8s 1.32+), with new implementation in 1.32
p5e.48xlarge instances with H200 GPUs (141GB HBM3) are now available and should be documented
g6e instance family with L40S GPUs provides cost-effective inference option
Gateway API has evolved to v1.2.0+ with improved HTTPRoute and GRPCRoute support
Karpenter v1.0+ is now GA with stable API (karpenter.sh/v1)
All documents need version updates to reflect 2025-2026 AWS and CNCF ecosystem changes
